trans-unit.source: Converts instances of the <xref href="System.String"></xref> type to and from <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> instances.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
Describes the context information of a type.
The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
`true` if the converter can convert from the specified type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> can be converted to a different type.
Conversion is possible only if `context` is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> type, and `destinationType` is a <xref:System.String> type.

In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> property for `context` cannot be null or equal to <xref:System.String.Empty>, which identifies `context` as an anonymous <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.
Describes the context information of a type.
The desired type that this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> is being evaluated for conversion.
`true` if the converter can convert this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> to the specified type; otherwise, `false`.
Attempts to convert a specified object to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
Describes the context information of a type.
Cultural-specific information that should be respected during conversion.
The object being converted.
The instance of that is created from the converted o parameter.
o is `null`.
o is not `null` and is not a valid type that can be converted to a .
Attempts to convert a specified object to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
Describes the context information of a type.
Cultural-specific information that should be respected during conversion.
The object being converted.
The type that this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> is converted to.
The object that is created from the converted instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
Occurs if value or destinationType is not a valid type for conversion.
Occurs if value or destinationType is `null`.
